text: Mercedes Pomares (9 April 1954 - 6 August 2024) was a volleyball player from Cuba. Mercedes competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1980 Summer Olympics. She was born on 9 April 1954.Mercedes Pomares She died on 6 August 2024, at the age of 70.Fallece Mercedes Pomares, la zurda de oro de las Morenas del Caribe == References == Category:1954 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Cuban volleyball players Category:Olympians for Cuba
title: Mercedes Pomares
